item.title: First Contact
item.description: print("Hello Internet") Welcome to my humble corner of the internet. This blog about me and my passions. I’l talk about technology, software development, machine learning, academia and other topics I find interesting. So, it only makes sense to start by saying how this site came to life. I’ve been thinking about starting a blog for a while now. I’m a child of the internet, I grew up reading all sorts of interesting things on other people’s website.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi, my name is Tasin Ishmam. I’m from Dhaka, Bangladesh. I’m currently studying Computer Science & Engineering at BUET. I’m interested in software development, machine learning & AI. I’m currently engaged in a research project which applies deep learning in object detection for Autonomous Vehicles. In my spare time, I like to travel and take photographs. I also love reading, film and podcasts. You can find my photography on instagram and find what I’m reading on Goodreads.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Feel free to say hi and introduce yourself. You can email me at tasinishmam@gmail.com :) I’m also open for Collaborating on Projects Professional Work Freelancing
